payload.title: Translate Spanish task titles to English
payload.description:
# Translate Spanish Task Titles to English

## Problem

Currently, some TaskRecords have titles in Spanish, which may cause:
- Inconsistency in the task backlog
- Difficulty for English-speaking contributors
- Mixed language in reports and dashboards

## Solution

Create a script/workflow to:

1. List all active tasks (status != done, status != archived)
2. Detect which tasks have Spanish titles
3. Translate ONLY the title to English (keep description as-is)
4. Update the task using `gitgov task edit`

## Implementation Notes

**Detection Strategy:**
- Use language detection (e.g., check for Spanish words like "implementar", "crear", "añadir", "mejorar")
- Or use a simple heuristic (accented characters: á, é, í, ó, ú, ñ)

**Translation:**
- Can use AI translation (OpenAI, Claude, etc.)
- Or manual translation for small backlog

**Update Method:**
```bash
# For each Spanish task:
gitgov task edit <task-id> --title "New English Title"
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Script lists all non-done, non-archived tasks
- [ ] Detects Spanish titles accurately
- [ ] Translates titles preserving technical meaning
- [ ] Updates tasks using proper CLI commands
- [ ] Preserves all other task metadata (description, tags, status, etc.)
- [ ] Reports which tasks were translated

## Example Transformations

- "Implementar validación de schemas" → "Implement schema validation"
- "Crear factory para EmbeddedMetadata" → "Create factory for EmbeddedMetadata"
- "Añadir tests de integración" → "Add integration tests"
